name: Red-Eyes Fang with Chain
desc: Target 1 "Red-Eyes" monster you control; equip this card to it. It can make a second attack on monsters during each Battle Phase. You can send this equipped card to the Graveyard, then target 1 Effect Monster on the field; equip that target to the monster this card was equipped to. While equipped by this effect, the equipped monster's ATK and DEF become equal to that monster's.
